description: Dark mode for researcher surfaces; image files untracked from git

changes.description: Untrack PNG and image files from git via .gitignore
Add dark mode toggle for researcher and researcher pages only. Uses next-themes (class-based). Toggle appears when researcher mode is active or on /researcher/* routes; resets to light on exit.
Shift Researcher ID badge right (left-12 top-2) to avoid overlap with the new dark mode toggle button
